tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vaccination_coverage (
    region_id INT,
    region_name VARCHAR(50),
    total_population INT,
    coverage_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
    immunization_schedule TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE immunization_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region_id INT,
    schedule_date DATE,
    vaccine_name VARCHAR(50),
    dose_number INT
);

CREATE TABLE immunization_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    center_id INT,
    vaccine_id INT,
    schedule_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (center_id) REFERENCES vaccination_centers(center_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (vaccine_id) REFERENCES vaccines(vaccine_id)
);

CREATE TABLE immunization_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    center_id INT,
    region_id INT,
    vaccine_id INT,
    schedule_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE vaccines (
 vaccine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 vaccine_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 manufacturer VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 recommended_age INT NOT NULL,
 storage_conditions VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE vaccination_records (
 record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 center_id INT,
 vaccine_id INT,
 patient_id INT,
 dosage INT,
 vaccination_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE immunization_schedules (
 schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 region_id INT,
 vaccine_id INT,
 age_group VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 due_date DATE
);
